tools.name: deploy-html
tools.description: Publish HTML or text content to the web by uploading it to EdgeOne Pages MCP. Generates a public URL instantly for easy access to your deployed content.
tools.instructions: Deploy HTML content to EdgeOne Pages, return the public URL

value.description: HTML or text content to deploy. Provide complete HTML or text content you want to publish, and the system will return a public URL where your content can be accessed.
